message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. I think it's a fair price considering its value and rarity.

Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a lower price. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $9000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value and rarity of the product.

Hi Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. I understand your concerns about the price, but I still believe the product is worth more than $9000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $10500. This is a fair price considering the value and rarity of the product.

Hi Alice, thank you for your revised offer. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'd like to make another counteroffer of $9500. I think this is a fair price considering the value and rarity of the product.

Hi Bob, thank you for your latest offer. I understand you're still looking for a better price, but I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price. I'm willing to compromise further and offer the product to you for $10200. This is a fair price considering the value and rarity of the product.

Hi Alice, thank you for your revised offer. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'd like to make another counteroffer of $9800. I think this is a fair price considering the value and rarity of the product.

Hi Bob, thank you for your latest offer. I understand you're still looking for a better price, but I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price. I'm willing to compromise further and offer the product to you for $10000. This is a fair price considering the value and rarity of the product.
